title: [BUG] DODGES ARE NOT CAUSING BAN TIMERS
body: So basically, i'm in champ select, and have gotten the same guys in 3 champion selects knowing that the people on my team were dodging, meaning their is no dodge timer for people who are dodging (not sure if this is only within premades as they were premade.)

replies.body: There is a bug in champ select at the moment where the client is not always being bought to the front of the screen when either to accept the match or to pick/ban, so I think it might be intentional until the bug is fixed in 6.3

So far from what I've seen Dynamic queue doesn't have a dodge penalty.
Or well it didn't.
NA and EU have dodge penalties back for Dynamic queue. People were complaining about not having a penalty for dodging.

I'd say it's a deliberate thing while people get used to the idea of not going AFK in champ select and actually locking their shit in.
Or maybe it was coincidence and the enemy team dodged? ... Who knows, could quite possible be a bug though, hopefully a red checks this out, good find if it turns out to be a bug ^^
No i personally ended up dodging a game as well on top of this, and there was no timer (and this was for an actual dodge by closing the league client)
